title: Build basic frontend chatbox with message history
goal: Provide a user interface for sending messages and viewing streamed responses.
action_items: [ ] Choose a frontend framework (e.g., Next.js, React, basic HTML+JS).
[ ] Create a simple UI with an input field and a submit button.
[ ] Add a display area for showing the conversation history (user messages and agent responses).
[ ] Implement JavaScript to capture user input and send it to the `/api/chat` endpoint (Task 4.1) via a POST request.
[ ] Implement JavaScript to handle the streaming response from the API.
[ ] Append the streamed tokens to the message history display area in real-time.
test_criteria: Open the frontend UI in a browser.
Type a message (e.g., 'Hi') into the input field and submit.
Verify the user message appears in the history.
Verify the agent's response streams into the history display area.
